name: Orbitel
description:
2772; 2 years after the end of the Universal War.


The once infamous research vessels of the Galactic Force lay silent. All of them abandoned in retreat.

Left behind were the low ranking, the die hards and the failed experiments.

Rumours began circulating of immense, dimensional powers aboard these vessels... but no one dares to board them.


Aside, that is, from you...




Controls

MoveArrow Keys Aim UpUp Arrow Key JumpX ShootZ (Hold for rapid fire) Start/PauseEnter Self DestructBackspace

Orbitel was made in 10 days for Black and White Jam #5. Huge thanks to everyone who took the time to play.

Click the Download button below.
